items.name: shiny stone
items.description: A smooth, grey stone that catches the light in an interesting way.

items.name: old map
items.description: A brittle piece of parchment with crude drawings. It seems to depict a series of caves.

items.name: rusty key
items.description: A corroded iron key. It looks ancient and fragile.

items.name: silver sword
items.description: A sharp sword with a silver blade, engraved with strange runes.

items.name: torch
items.description: A wooden torch that can be lit to illuminate dark places.

items.name: golden crown
items.description: An ornate crown studded with jewels. It must be incredibly valuable.

items.name: health potion
items.description: A small red vial that restores your vitality when consumed.

items.name: ancient tome
items.description: A dusty old book filled with cryptic symbols and magical incantations.

items.name: fishing rod
items.description: A sturdy rod perfect for catching fish in calm waters.

items.name: rope
items.description: A long, thick rope. It might help you climb or descend somewhere dangerous.

rooms.name: Forest Clearing
rooms.description: You are in a sunny clearing surrounded by tall trees. A narrow trail leads north to a small village. To the east, you see the dark mouth of a cave. A path south leads to a quiet lake.

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description: You stand before the gaping maw of a cave. A chill wind blows from within. The forest lies to the west, and a narrow tunnel leads deeper north.

rooms.name: Dark Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel is pitch black and damp. You hear faint dripping. A faint glow lies ahead to the north. The cave entrance is back to the south.

rooms.name: Underground Chamber
rooms.description: A wide chamber with moss-covered walls. A locked door stands to the east, and a collapsed passage lies to the west. You can go back south into the tunnel.

rooms.name: Hidden Vault
rooms.description: A secret stone vault glimmers with faint torchlight. Ancient chests line the walls. You sense danger. The only exit is west.

rooms.name: Village Outskirts
rooms.description: You arrive at the outskirts of a small, peaceful village. Farmers work in nearby fields. Paths lead south back to the forest and east into the market.

rooms.name: Village Market
rooms.description: Bustling stalls line the road. Merchants shout, and the smell of food fills the air. The blacksmith’s forge is to the north.

rooms.name: Blacksmith Forge
rooms.description: The forge burns brightly. Tools hang neatly on the walls. A half-finished sword rests on the anvil. To the south is the market.

rooms.name: Lakeside
rooms.description: You reach a calm, sparkling lake. Ducks glide across the water. A small boat is tied to a post. Paths lead north to the forest and east to the ruins.

rooms.name: Ancient Ruins
rooms.description: Crumbling pillars and overgrown stones mark the site of an ancient temple. There’s a staircase leading down into darkness.

rooms.name: Sunken Catacombs
rooms.description: You find yourself in damp, torch-lit tunnels beneath the ruins. The air is thick and heavy. A narrow path leads up, and a doorway lies east.

rooms.name: Forgotten Shrine
rooms.description: An eerie shrine filled with flickering candles and ancient idols. A faint hum fills the air. The only exit is west.

rooms.name: Wizard Tower Base
rooms.description: A tall, crumbling tower looms above you. The entrance door is unlocked. A winding staircase spirals upward.

rooms.name: Wizard Tower Library
rooms.description: The circular room is filled with dusty books and magical artifacts. The air crackles with energy. A ladder leads up to the observatory.

rooms.name: Observatory
rooms.description: At the top of the tower, stars twinkle through shattered glass panels. Strange mechanisms point toward the heavens. The way down leads back to the library.
